breakfast.name: Mirelurk Benedict
breakfast.desc: Poached mirelurk eggs served on a toasted wasteland muffin, topped with brahmin bacon and hollandaise sauce made from irradiated butter.

breakfast.name: Nuka-Coffee Pancakes
breakfast.desc: Fluffy pancakes made with Nuka-Cola, served with radroot syrup and a side of crispy radroach hash browns.

breakfast.name: Wasteland Omelette
breakfast.desc: A fluffy omelette filled with sautéed mutant mushrooms, radroach bacon, and grated wasteland cheese. Served with a slice of toasted wasteland bread.

breakfast.name: Swamp Plant Smoothie Bowl
breakfast.desc: A refreshing smoothie bowl made with blended swamp plant, wild tarberry, and mutant banana. Topped with crunchy radroach granola and fresh wasteland berries.

soups.name: Radstag Stew
soups.desc: Hearty stew made with tender radstag meat, wild vegetables, and wasteland spices. Served with a slice of crusty wasteland bread.

soups.name: Glowing Mirelurk Bisque
soups.desc: Creamy bisque made from glowing mirelurk meat, mutant potatoes, and a hint of radiated cream. Garnished with sautéed swamp plant leaves.

soups.name: Nuka-Noodle Soup
soups.desc: Comforting noodle soup with Nuka-Cola infused broth, shredded radstag meat, and wild tarberry noodles. Topped with crispy cave fungus strips.

ourFavoritesMenu.name: Enclave Elixir
ourFavoritesMenu.desc: A mysterious and rare cocktail rumored to be a favorite of the elusive Enclave members. Crafted with aged wasteland whiskey, secret Enclave herbs, and a splash of Nuka-Cola Quantum. Served in a specially designed glowing glass.

ourFavoritesMenu.name: Vault 13 Prime Rib
ourFavoritesMenu.desc: Exceptionally tender prime rib sourced from the legendary Vault 13 Brahmin. Slow-roasted with wasteland herbs and served with a side of Vault-Tec preserved vegetables and gravy.

ourFavoritesMenu.name: Nuka-Cola Dark Chocolate Truffles
ourFavoritesMenu.desc: Handcrafted dark chocolate truffles filled with a Nuka-Cola-infused ganache. Each truffle is delicately dusted with powdered mutant fruit for a unique and exquisite flavor. (Per Dozen)

ourFavoritesMenu.name: Glowing Radstag Steak
ourFavoritesMenu.desc: A premium cut of radstag steak marinated in a rare glowing fungus sauce, giving it a subtle glow. Grilled to perfection and served with a side of brahmin milk mashed potatoes and sautéed wasteland greens.

ourFavoritesMenu.name: Plasma-Infused Soufflé
ourFavoritesMenu.desc: A decadent soufflé made with eggs from mutant birds and infused with plasma fruit essence. Baked to a fluffy perfection, it melts in your mouth and is served with a drizzle of caramelized honey mesquite.

ourFavoritesMenu.name: Quantum Starcake
ourFavoritesMenu.desc: An otherworldly dessert featuring layers of Quantum-flavored sponge cake, interlaced with glowing frosting. Topped with a sculpted Nuka-Cola Quantum star and a sprinkle of stardust sugar.

sandwiches.name: Mega Molerat Melt
sandwiches.desc: Grilled molerat meat with wasteland cheese, radroot, and glowing fungus on toasted bread.

sandwiches.name: Radroach Reuben
sandwiches.desc: Sliced radroach meat, sauerkraut, thousand island dressing on rye bread.

sandwiches.name: Wasteland BLT
sandwiches.desc: Radroach bacon, lettuce, mutant tomato, radroot aioli on toasted bread.

sandwiches.name: Deathclaw Club
sandwiches.desc: Grilled deathclaw meat, brahmin bacon, tarberry jam, mutant lettuce on triple-decker bread.

salads.name: Wasteland Cobb Salad
salads.desc: Mixed greens, brahmin steak, radroot, wild tarberry, mutant egg, radroach bacon, ghoulberry vinaigrette.

salads.name: Nuka-Caesar Salad
salads.desc: Romaine lettuce, wasteland croutons, radtato, wasteland cheese, Caesar dressing.

salads.name: Mutant Mushroom Salad
salads.desc: Sautéed mutant mushrooms, glowing fungus, wild greens, wasteland herb vinaigrette, radroot seeds.

pastaDishes.name: Brahmin Bolognese
pastaDishes.desc: Meat sauce with brahmin, radstag, radroach meat, wasteland spaghetti, mutant parmesan.

pastaDishes.name: Mutant Mushroom Ravioli
pastaDishes.desc: Ravioli with mutant mushrooms, ricotta, wasteland herbs, wild tarberry sauce, radscorpion tails.

pastaDishes.name: Nuka-Pesto Pasta
pastaDishes.desc: Pasta with wild basil pesto, radroot, mutant pine nuts, wasteland cheese.

pastaDishes.name: Deathclaw Carbonara
pastaDishes.desc: Pasta carbonara with brahmin bacon, mutant eggs, wasteland cheese, black pepper, radroot.

pastaDishes.name: Radroach Primavera
pastaDishes.desc: Wasteland spaghetti, sautéed radroach, roasted vegetables, garlic herb sauce, mutant parmesan.

snacks.name: Radroach Crunchies
snacks.desc: Crispy fried radroach exoskeletons seasoned with wasteland spices. A crunchy and protein-packed snack for any survivor.

snacks.name: Blamco Mac Bites
snacks.desc: Bite-sized portions of Blamco Mac 'n' Cheese, breaded and deep-fried. Served with a side of glowing fungus ranch dipping sauce.

snacks.name: Nuka-Corn on the Cob
snacks.desc: Grilled mutant corn on the cob brushed with a Nuka-Cola glaze and sprinkled with irradiated salt. A sweet and savory snack for the road.

snacks.name: Cave Fungus Chips
snacks.desc: Thinly sliced cave fungus chips, lightly salted and fried to perfection. Crispy and addictive, a favorite wasteland snack.

snacks.name: Mole Rat Poppers
snacks.desc: Mole rat meatballs stuffed with radroach eggs and deep-fried. Served with a tangy bloodbug tomato sauce for dipping.

shareables.name: Brahmin Nachos
shareables.desc: Crispy wasteland chips piled high with brahmin chili, melted wasteland cheese, guacamole made from mutant avocados, and jalapeño radtato salsa.

shareables.name: Radroach Sliders Platter
shareables.desc: Mini radroach sliders served with various toppings: pickled glowing fungus, caramelized wild tarberry, and spicy ghoulberry relish. Perfect for sharing.

shareables.name: Mutfruit Sushi Roll
shareables.desc: A sushi roll made with mutant fruit, wild tarberry, and radroach meat. Rolled in seaweed and served with wasabi made from irradiated horseradish.

shareables.name: Yao Guai Wings
shareables.desc: Spicy and sticky Yao Guai wings glazed with a honey-mesquite sauce. Served with crispy radroot fries and a side of mutant blue cheese dip.

shareables.name: Nuka-Cola Glazed Ribs
shareables.desc: Tender ribs glazed with a sweet and spicy Nuka-Cola sauce, served with crispy mutfruit slaw. A flavorful wasteland delicacy.
